name: Kix
overview: Kix was an exclusive release on The Superior Collection Volume 2. It did not get a standalone release. Kix is a clone of the 1981 arcade game Qix. At the start of each level, the playing field is a large, empty rectangle, containing the Kix, a stick-like entity that performs graceful but unpredictable motions within the confines of the rectangle. The objective is to fill at least 75% of the screen while avoiding the Kix. Other deadly enemies also move around the lines drawn on the rectangles so must be avoided.
